00019         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00020         {
00021             tableErrorMessage.Visible = false;
00022             lblErrorMessage.Visible = false;
00023             lblErrorMessage.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.Color, "red");
00024 
00025             userId = Convert.ToInt32(Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID]);
00026 
00027             IUserRepository userRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00028             user = userRepo.GetById(userId);
00029 
00030             if (!IsPostBack)
00031                 populateInformation();
00032         }

00035         {

00037

00044             ddCardType.SelectedValue = user.cc_type;

00046             txtSecurityCode.Text = user.cc_scode;
00047             txtNameOnCard.Text = user.cc_nameOnCard;

00062         protected void btnEditLoginInfo_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00063         {
00064             //Email address is used as username and cannot be empty
00065             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtEmailAddress.Text.Trim()))
00066             {
00067                 lblErrorMessage.Text = "Please enter required (*) information";
00068                 lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00069                 tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00070                 return;
00071             }
00072             //Passwords must match
00073             if (!txtNewPassword.Text.Equals(txtNewPasswordConfirm.Text))
00074             {
00075                 lblErrorMessage.Text = "Password fields do not match";
00076                 lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00077                 tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00078                 return;
00079             }
00080             //This information is already in the db and does not need to be saved again
00081             if (txtEmailAddress.Text.Equals(user.email) && String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtNewPassword.Text))
00082                 return;
00083 
00084             IUserRepository userRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00085             User newUser = userRepo.GetById((int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID]);
00086 
00087             //If username is changed
00088             if (!user.email.Equals(txtEmailAddress.Text))
00089             {
00090                 bool userExists = userRepo.Users.Any(u => u.email.Equals(txtEmailAddress.Text));
00091 
00092                 //check to see if email already exists
00093                 if (userExists)
00094                 {
00095                     lblErrorMessage.Text = "Username (email) already in use";
00096                     lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00097                     tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00098                     //return email already in use error message
00099                     return;
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 newUser.email = txtEmailAddress.Text;
00103             }
00104 
00105             //if password is changed, add it to the db
00106             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtNewPassword.Text.Trim()))
00107             {
00108                 //Should verify if correct formatting in this step
00109                 newUser.password = Security.MD5Encode(txtNewPassword.Text.Trim());
00110             }
00111 
00112             //userRepo.UpdateUserInfo(newUser);
00113             userRepo.SubmitChanges();
00114 
00115             lblErrorMessage.Text = "Request Completed";
00116             lblErrorMessage.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.Color, "green");
00117             lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00118             tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00119         }
00120 
00121         protected void btnEditOtherInfo_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00122         {
00123             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtFirstName.Text.Trim()) ||
00124                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtLastName.Text.Trim()) ||
00125                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtPhoneNumber.Text.Trim()) ||
00126                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtBillAddressLine1.Text.Trim()) ||
00127                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtBillCity.Text.Trim()) ||
00128                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtBillState.Text.Trim()) ||
00129                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtBillZipCode.Text.Trim()))
00130             {
00131                 lblErrorMessage.Text = "Please enter required (*) information";
00132                 lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00133                 tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00134                 return;
00135             }
00136 
00137             IUserRepository userRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00138             User newUser = userRepo.GetById((int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID]);
00139 
00140             newUser.firstName = txtFirstName.Text.Trim();
00141             newUser.lastName = txtLastName.Text.Trim();
00142             newUser.company = txtCompanyName.Text.Trim();
00143             newUser.homePhone = txtPhoneNumber.Text.Trim();
00144

00148             newUser.cc_scode = txtSecurityCode.Text.Trim();
